title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 114 - Supervision And Regulation Of Article Xii Investment Company Holding Companies And Their Subsidiaries For Purposes Of The European Union Financial Conglomerates Directive
content:

State Regulations
§ 114.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 114.2 - Definitions
§ 114.3 - Examination, supervision, regulation, and enforcement authority of the superintendent over investment company holding companies and their subsidiaries for purposes of the european union financial conglomerates directive

§ 114.5 - Limitations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 114

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §14, art. XII
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
